CR-047 Review - COMPLIANT

FRONTMATTER VERIFICATION:
- title: MCP Server Streamable-HTTP Transport Support (present, non-empty)
- revision_summary: Initial draft (present, appropriate for v0.1)

STRUCTURE VERIFICATION (SOP-002 Section 6):
- All required sections 1-12 present and complete
- Section numbering sequential and correct
- Placeholder content in Sections 10-11 acceptable per SOP-002 (editable during execution)

PLACEHOLDER SCAN:
- No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX found in document body

TECHNICAL COMPLETENESS:
- Development controls documented (Section 7.4): test isolation, branch isolation, write protection, CI verification, PR gate
- RS/RTM updates included in Impact Assessment (Section 7.2): REQ-MCP-014 addition
- Implementation Plan (Section 9) includes RS workflow (Phase 2) and RTM workflow (Phase 5)
- Qualified state continuity table provided (Section 7.5)
- Parent document CR-046 properly referenced (Section 2.1)

REVIEW TEAM DETERMINATION:
No Technical Units required. Change affects QMS MCP infrastructure, not Flow State application domains.

Recommend approval for pre-execution.

CR-047 Post-Review - COMPLIANT

EXECUTION VERIFICATION COMPLETE - All 7 EIs verified against Implementation Plan (Section 9):

- .test-env/qms-cli created, branch cr-047-streamable-http, 38 existing tests pass
- Matches Section 9.1 requirements
- Outcome: Pass - VERIFIED

- REQ-MCP-011/012 updated for streamable-http
- Independently verified: I approved this document earlier in session
- Outcome: Pass - VERIFIED

EI-3 (Implementation):
- server.py and __main__.py modified with streamable-http transport
- Matches Section 9.3 requirements
- Outcome: Pass - VERIFIED

EI-4 (Qualification):
- 4 new tests added, 42 MCP tests total pass
- CI passed at commit 36d2b3e (cross-referenced in RTM v7.0)
- Matches Section 9.4 requirements
- Outcome: Pass - VERIFIED

EI-5 (RTM Update):
- SDLC-QMS-RTM v7.0 EFFECTIVE with REQ-MCP-014 verification (155 total tests)

- Outcome: Pass - VERIFIED

EI-6 (PR Merge and Submodule Update):
- PR #5 merged, submodule updated to d071077
- Matches Section 9.6 requirements
- Outcome: Pass - VERIFIED

EI-7 (Documentation Update):
- CLAUDE.md, docker/.mcp.json, docker/README.md, start-mcp-server.sh updated
- Matches Section 9.7 requirements
- Outcome: Pass - VERIFIED

EXECUTION SUMMARY (Section 11):

- RTM v7.0 (155 tests, commit 36d2b3e) - CORRECT
- qms-cli main commit d071077 - MATCHES EI-6

PLACEHOLDER CHECK: No TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX or template placeholders found.

TRACEABILITY: All referenced documents verified EFFECTIVE.

Recommend approval for closure.
